text: @GavinNewsom 70 degrees and above in direct UV light KILLS COVID-19 immediately on porous surfaces. Takes another minute on nonporous surfaces. Humidity makes it better according to the scientist on the national press conference late last week. It’s “SAFER to be outside than inside”
